meanings.definition: The act of making something ugly.
meanings.sent1: Her uglifications of the painting ruined its beauty.
meanings.sent2: The artist's uglifications transformed the room into a dark and dreary space.
meanings.sent3: The clown's clumsiness led to unintentional uglifications of the party decorations.
meanings.sent4: The storm's fury brought about nature's own uglifications to the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The magician's spell cast unexpected uglifications on the once charming garden.

meanings.definition: The state of being made ugly.
meanings.sent1: The uglifications of the building were evident after years of neglect.
meanings.sent2: Despite the uglifications, the beauty of the garden still shone through.
meanings.sent3: The movie's plot twist resulted in comedic uglifications of the protagonist.
meanings.sent4: The old mirror reflected the uglifications of time on the once youthful face.
meanings.sent5: The mask hid the uglifications of the scarred warrior, revealing only strength and courage.
